hadiths.text: Narrated Abdullah ibn Umar: The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to give to some of the detachments he sent out (something extra) for themselves in particular apart from the division made to the whole army. The fifth is necessary in all that

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي نَفْلِ السَّرِيَّةِ تَخْرُجُ مِنَ الْعَسْكَرِ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding The Nafl In The Case Of Detachement Of The Army
